audioText: Cette déclaration politique controversée a littéralement provoqué un tollé général dans tous les médias nationaux et internationaux hier soir.
question: How did the media react to the controversial political statement?
options: It literally caused a general outcry in all national and international media
It gradually generated moderate criticism across various news platforms
It immediately sparked intense debates among political commentators only
It surprisingly received unanimous support from mainstream journalism
explanation: The text states 'Cette déclaration politique controversée a littéralement provoqué un tollé général dans tous les médias nationaux et internationaux hier soir' - This controversial political statement literally caused a general outcry in all national and international media last night.
